page.title: 12A SUBURBAN WEEKEND.
page.content: Many people do jobs at the weekend that they don't do during the week. For example, I sometimes do a bit of gardening. My mother might help, whereas my father will just lie down on the settee, read the paper and watch the television. Every Saturday my whole family goes shopping in the Bexleyheath shopping centre. We go into Sainsbury's to do our main shopping for the week. When it comes to D.I.Y. at home, nobody is really interested. In the end my grand-dad does the odd-jobs. He's retired now so he has a lot of spare time. Most of our family has a hobby. My dad loves reading books, my mum likes relaxing in the garden and I like collecting stamps and reading. So as you see our family does lots of things it does not do during the week. There must be many families like ours.
